tit.e: Kyohei NAKAMURA
Kyohei NAKAMURA
Kyohei NAKAMURA

sen.j: 中村 恭平（なかむら きょうへい、1855年7月4日（安政2年5月21日 (旧暦)） - 1934年（昭和9年）1月21日）は、教育者。
sen.e: Kyohei NAKAMURA (July 4, 1855 - January 21, 1934) is a educator.
Kyohei NAKAMURA (July 4, 1855 - January 21, 1934) is an educator.
Kyohei NAKAMURA (July 4, 1855 - January 21, 1934) is an educator.

sen.j: 東京物理学講習所（後の東京物理学校、現在の東京理科大学）の創立者の一人で、東京物理学校第3代校長。
sen.e: He is one of the founders of the Tokyo Academy of Physics (later the Tokyo College of Science, current Tokyo University of Science), and the third director of the Tokyo College of Science.
sen.cmt: 東京物理学講習所：The Tokyo Academy of Physics東京物理学校：the Tokyo College of Science（参照：http://www.sut.ac.jp/en/）
sen.e: He is one of the founders of the Tokyo Academy of Physics (later the Tokyo College of Science, current Tokyo University of Science), and the third director of the Tokyo College of Science.
He is one of the founders of the Tokyo Academy of Physics (later the Tokyo College of Science, current Tokyo University of Science), and the third director of the Tokyo College of Science.

tit.e: Career
Career
Career

tit.j: 1855年7月4日（安政2年5月21日）- 三河国田原藩に生まれる。
tit.e: In July 4, 1855: Born in Tahara Domain, Mikawa Province.
In July 4, 1855: Born in Tahara Domain, Mikawa Province.
In July 4, 1855: Born in Tahara Domain, Mikawa Province.

tit.j: 1870年（明治3年）- 貢進生となり、開成学校（後の東京大学）へ入学する。
tit.e: In 1870: Became a koushinsei (referral student from each domain) and enrolled in Kaisei Gakko (Kaisei School, later The University of Tokyo).
tit.cmt: 貢進生：定訳不明です。 (referral student from each domainとしました。)
tit.e: In 1870: Became a koshinsei (referral student from each domain) and enrolled in Kaisei Gakko (Kaisei School, later The University of Tokyo).
In 1870: Became a koshinsei (referral student from each domain) and enrolled in Kaisei Gakko (Kaisei School, later The University of Tokyo).

tit.j: 1878年（明治11年）- 東京大学仏語物理学科第1期卒業。
tit.e: In 1878: Graduated from the inaugural class of Department of French Physics, the University of Tokyo.
tit.cmt: 仏語物理学科：定訳不明です。第1期卒業：定訳不明です。
tit.e: In 1878: Graduated from the University of Tokyo as a member of the inaugural class of Department of Physics called "Department of French Physics", in which the lectures were given in French by a French instructor.

In 1878: Graduated from the University of Tokyo as a member of the inaugural class of Department of Physics called "Department of French Physics", in which the lectures were given in French by a French instructor.

tit.j: 1881年（明治14年）- 東京物理学講習所の創立者の一人となる。
tit.e: In 1881: Became one of the founders of the Tokyo Academy of Physics.
In 1881: Became one of the founders of the Tokyo Academy of Physics.
In 1881: Became one of the founders of the Tokyo Academy of Physics.

tit.j: 1885年（明治18年）- 東京物理学校維持同盟員となる。
tit.e: In 1885: Became a member of the association of preserving the Tokyo Academy of Physics.
tit.cmt: 維持同盟員：定訳不明です。
tit.e: In 1885: Became a member of the association of preservation of the Tokyo Academy of Physics.
In 1885: Became a member of the association of preservation of the Tokyo Academy of Physics.

tit.j: 1887年（明治20年）1月- 福島師範学校（後に、福島県尋常師範学校、現在の福島大学）校長となる。
tit.e: In January 1887: Became the director of Fukushima Normal School (later Fukushima Prefectural Ordinary Normal School, current Fukushima University).
In January 1887: Became the director of Fukushima Normal School (later Fukushima Prefectural Ordinary Normal School, current Fukushima University).
In January 1887: Became the director of Fukushima Normal School (later Fukushima Prefectural Ordinary Normal School, current Fukushima University).

tit.j: 1895年（明治28年）12月- 福島県尋常師範学校校長を辞する。
tit.e: In December 1895: Resigned as the director of Fukushima Prefectural Ordinary Normal School.
In December 1895: Resigned his post as the director of Fukushima Prefectural Ordinary Normal School.
tit.cmt: Resigned as --> Resigned his post as
tit.e: In December 1895: Resigned his post as the director of Fukushima Prefectural Ordinary Normal School.

tit.j: 1898年（明治31年）- 東京帝国大学（現在の東京大学）舎監となる。
tit.e: In 1898: Became a housemaster of Tokyo Imperial University (current the University of Tokyo).
In 1898: Became shakan (the dormitory dean) of Tokyo Imperial University (current the University of Tokyo).
tit.cmt: 用語集に合わせて「舎監」はshakan (the dormitory dean)にしました。
tit.e: In 1898: Became shakan (the dormitory dean) of Tokyo Imperial University (current the University of Tokyo).

tit.j: 1902年（明治35年）頃- 山川健次郎（東京帝国大学総長）の秘書となる。
tit.e: Around 1902: Became a secretary of Kenjiro YAMAKAWA (the President of Tokyo Imperial University).
Around 1902: Became a secretary of Kenjiro YAMAKAWA (the President of Tokyo Imperial University).
Around 1902: Became a secretary of Kenjiro YAMAKAWA (the President of Tokyo Imperial University).

tit.j: 1904年（明治37年）頃- 東京帝国大学准教授となり、夏目漱石（同大学講師）と親交を持つ。
tit.e: Around 1904: Became an associate professor of Tokyo Imperial University, and formed a close friendship with Soseki NATSUME (Instructor of the university).
Around 1904: Became an associate professor of Tokyo Imperial University, and formed a close friendship with Soseki NATSUME (Instructor of the university).
Around 1904: Became an associate professor of Tokyo Imperial University, and formed a close friendship with Soseki NATSUME (Instructor of the university).

sen.j: 夏目漱石の『坊っちゃん』の主人公が、東京物理学校へ通う設定にしたことに影響を与えたといわれる。
sen.e: He influenced on the story setting of Soseki NATSUME's "Botchan" that the main character went to the Tokyo College of Science.
It is said that he influenced the story setting of Soseki NATSUME's "Bochan" in which the main character studies at the Tokyo College of Science.
sen.cmt: It is said構文を採用し、その他表現の見直しました。
sen.e: It is said that he influenced the story setting of Soseki NATSUME's "Bochan" in which the main character studies at the Tokyo College of Science.

tit.j: 1913年（大正2年）- 東京物理学校に、幹事兼主計として常勤する。
tit.e: In 1913: Made a full-time commitment to the Tokyo College of Science as organizer and accountant.
tit.cmt: 幹事兼主計：定訳不明です。
tit.e: In 1913: Made a full-time commitment to the Tokyo College of Science as a manager and accountant.
tit.cmt: as organizer and accountant --> as a manager and accountant
tit.e: In 1913: Made a full-time commitment to the Tokyo College of Science as a manager and accountant.

sen.j: 昼間は東京帝国大学、夜間は東京物理学校へ勤めた。
sen.e: He worked for Tokyo Imperial University in the daytime and the Tokyo College of Science in the nighttime.
He worked for Tokyo Imperial University in the daytime and the Tokyo College of Science in the nighttime.
He worked for Tokyo Imperial University in the daytime and the Tokyo College of Science in the nighttime.

tit.j: 1923年（大正12年）- 東京帝国大学書記官を辞する。
tit.e: In 1923: Resigned as secretary of Tokyo Imperial University.
In 1923: Resigned his post as secretary of Tokyo Imperial University.
In 1923: Resigned his post as secretary of Tokyo Imperial University.

tit.j: 1930年（昭和5年）1月7日- 東京物理学校の第3代校長となる。
tit.e: In January 7, 1930: Became the third director of the Tokyo College of Science.
In January 7, 1930: Became the third director of the Tokyo College of Science.
In January 7, 1930: Became the third director of the Tokyo College of Science.

tit.j: 1934年（昭和9年）1月21日- 死去により、東京物理学校校長を辞する。
tit.e: In January 21, 1934: Resigned as director of the Tokyo College of Science by his death.
In January 21, 1934: Resigned the post as director of the Tokyo College of Science due to his death.
In January 21, 1934: Resigned the post as director of the Tokyo College of Science due to his death.
